Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: An array of voices from politicians to healthcare professionals are advocating for change ahead of the Federal Budget. There are ongoing calls to increase JobSeeker payments while significant changes are also anticipated for the welfare system for single parents and the Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme however the latter has seen concerns raised about the impact of changes to prescription drug accessibility on healthcare in remote and rural areas. As preparations for the Budget continue voices from various sectors stress the need for effective policies that can improve the lives of millions of Australians.
